alert.note: Alert for Isle of Wight; James City; Newport News; Suffolk; Surry (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Coastal Flood Watch issued September 29 at 6:21AM EDT until September 30 at 7:00PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD WATCH IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH FRIDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Around two feet of inundation above ground level possible in low- lying areas near shorelines and tidal waterways. * WHERE...Surry, James City, Isle of Wight and Newport News Counties, and Suffolk. * WHEN...From Friday afternoon through Friday evening. * IMPACTS...Numerous roads may be closed. Low lying property including homes, businesses, and some critical infrastructure may be inundated. Some shoreline erosion may occur. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Additional flooding will be possible with the next high tide cycle Saturday. Time of high total tides are approximate to the nearest hour. JAMES RIVER AT SCOTLAND/JAMESTOWN VA MLLW CATEGORIES - MINOR 4.0 FT, MODERATE 4.5 FT, MAJOR 5.0 FT MHHW CATEGORIES - MINOR 1.8 FT, MODERATE 2.3 FT, MAJOR 2.8 FT TOTAL TOTAL DEPARTURE DAY/TIME TIDE TIDE FROM NORM WAVES FLOOD FT MLLW FT MHHW FT FT IMPACT -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 29/03 PM 3.2 1.0 0.6 1 NONE 30/03 AM 3.2 1.0 1.2 1 NONE 30/04 PM 4.6 2.4 2.0 1 MODERATE 01/04 AM 4.7 2.5 2.8 1 MODERATE 01/05 PM 4.0 1.8 1.5 1 MINOR SEWELLS POINT VA MLLW CATEGORIES - MINOR 4.5 FT, MODERATE 5.5 FT, MAJOR 6.5 FT MHHW CATEGORIES - MINOR 1.7 FT, MODERATE 2.7 FT, MAJOR 3.7 FT TOTAL TOTAL DEPARTURE DAY/TIME TIDE TIDE FROM NORM WAVES FLOOD FT MLLW FT MHHW FT FT IMPACT -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 29/12 PM 4.2 1.4 1.0 4-5 NONE 30/12 AM 4.0 1.2 1.4 5 NONE 30/01 PM 5.3 2.5 2.1 5-6 MINOR 01/01 AM 5.2 2.4 2.7 5-6 MINOR 01/02 PM 4.5 1.7 1.4 2-3 MINOR 02/02 AM 3.7 0.9 1.3 2-3 NONE FORT MONROE VA MLLW CATEGORIES - MINOR 4.5 FT, MODERATE 5.5 FT, MAJOR 6.0 FT MHHW CATEGORIES - MINOR 1.7 FT, MODERATE 2.7 FT, MAJOR 3.2 FT TOTAL TOTAL DEPARTURE DAY/TIME TIDE TIDE FROM NORM WAVES FLOOD FT MLLW FT MHHW FT FT IMPACT -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 29/12 PM 4.2 1.4 0.9 4-5 NONE 30/12 AM 4.0 1.2 1.4 5 NONE 30/01 PM 5.2 2.4 2.0 5-6 MINOR 01/01 AM 5.3 2.5 2.8 5-6 MINOR 01/01 PM 4.5 1.7 1.5 2-3 MINOR 02/02 AM 3.8 1.0 1.4 2-3 NONE &&
info.instruction: If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property.
